channel.title: OpenVPN over TOR
channel.description: Hi. There was a need to hide the use of the TOR network on the end node before going to the WW, I eventually chose to use OpenVPN. However, I did not find a single recent manual for connecting VPN on Whonix Workstation, all the read manuals and guides were dated for a long time / do not work / apply exclusively to Qubes OS. The question is, have anyone had successful OpenVPN practices lately and which VPN services are best suited for this? I also stumbled upon RiseUP VPN but suddenly found "The Riseup "legacy" VPN may have been discontinued, as it no longer works for the author of these instructions." in the VPN-firewall manual, so question stays open. Looking forward to your opinions about whole practice hiding TOR usage and actual methods.

item.title: OpenVPN over TOR
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 15 May 20

Combining Tunnels with Tor

Information on whether Tor gets more or less secure when combining Tor with tunnels such as VPN, SSH, proxies. (User → Tor → proxy/VPN/SSH → Internet) (User → proxy/VPN/SSH → Tor → Internet)

Whonix – 27 May 19

Connecting to Tor before a VPN

Instructions on how to connect to Tor before a VPN (User → Tor → VPN → Internet)

It’s up to date. Nothing changed since. It’s difficult because it’s VPN provider specific.

Mexa:

which VPN services are best suited for this?

Whonix doesn’t test / endorse any VPNs.

Mexa:

Looking forward to your opinions about whole practice hiding TOR usage and actual methods.

Whonix – 28 Mar 20

Hide Tor use from the Internet Service Provider

Prevent the Internet Service Provider from discovering you are a Tor user.

Read full topic

item.title: OpenVPN over TOR
item.dc:creator: Mexa
item.description:
Hi.
There was a need to hide the use of the TOR network on the end node before going to the WW, I eventually chose to use OpenVPN. However, I did not find a single recent manual for connecting VPN on Whonix Workstation, all the read manuals and guides were dated for a long time / do not work / apply exclusively to Qubes OS.
The question is, have anyone had successful OpenVPN practices lately and which VPN services are best suited for this? I also stumbled upon RiseUP VPN but suddenly found “The Riseup “legacy” VPN may have been discontinued, as it no longer works for the author of these instructions.” in the VPN-firewall manual, so question stays open.
Looking forward to your opinions about whole practice hiding TOR usage and actual methods.

Read full topic
